page.title: 02DESCRIPTION CONTINUED
page.content: TO LISKEARD,PLYMOUTH AND OTHER PLACES. CHILDREN MUST ALSO COMMUTE TO SCHOOL THERE BEINB NO SCHOOL AT ALL IN THE BLOCK. LIKEWISE THERE ARE NO BAMKS, BENEFIT OFFICES, DOCTOR'S SURGERIES OR DENTISTS IN THE BLOCK. THERE IS HOWEVER ONE POST OFFICE. TRANSPORT IS THEREFORE ESSENTIAL AS FEW PEOPLE ARE TRULY SELF SUFFICIENT. THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT OF THE BLOCK IS ALSO INTERESTING. AT PRESENT HERODSFOOT VILLAGE IS IN THE CARE OF THREE DIFFERENT PARISH COUNCILS, DULOE, LANREATH, AND ST.PINNOCK. AT THE MOMENT HOWEVER PLANS ARE BEING DRAWN UP TO BRING THE WHOLE OF HERODSFOOT UNDER DULOE. THE BLOCK IS INTENSELY BEAUTIFUL, AND MORE REMOTE THAN SOME AREAS ADDING TO ITS TOURIST VALUE. THE FORESTRY COMMISSION IS AMONG THOSE LETTING CHALETS.
